content: this text describes a legal case involving the sale of an apartment and the termination of a lease agreement the parties involved are referred to as mm rr mp and p the court issued a court order for the sale of the apartment and the tenants referred to as xxx were required to vacate the premises the purpose of the sale was to terminate the lease agreement as prescribed by the law mm the legal representative of xxx submitted a notice of termination of the lease agreement to comply with the courts decision the text also mentions the division of the apartment property based on inheritance laws and a compromise agreement the parties agree to transfer ownership of the apartment to a third party and consider the disputes resolved they confirm their obligations and responsibilities including potential taxation issues the text discusses procedural costs and the need for cooperation to achieve the goals of the compromise agreement the text concludes by giving consent for various transactions and terminating the legal proceedings
